DTS:LogProvider.DTS:Description: Writes log entries for events to a SQL Server database
DTS:LogProvider.DTS:ObjectName: SSIS log provider for SQL Server

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
UPDATE dbo.AUX_H_DEBITOS_DIARIOS SET id_prestacion = id_nomenclador+de_codigo_prestacion
UPDATE dbo.AUX_H_DEBITOS_DIARIOS SET fecha_prestacion = '19000101' where isdate(substring(fecha_prestacion,1,4)+'-'+substring(fecha_prestacion,5,2)+'-'+substring(fecha_prestacion,7,2)+' ') = 0

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.

property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

properties.property:
Select CC.CUC_FRE as fecha_recepcion, CC.CUC_FCI as fecha_cierre, CC.CUC_NUM as nro_cursograma, CC.BCP_COD as Posicion_Barra, CP.CPLRES as id_usuario_responsable, T.W47CON as Id_Concepto, T.W47CCT as Signo, CP.CPLLNU as Nro_Lote, 99999999 as Nro_Secuencia, 999 as Tipo_Orden, 999999 as Nro_Orden, '99' as Nomenclador, '99' as Codigo_Prestacion, CC.CUC_ACC as Id_Acreedor, (CASE when CC.CUCREI = '' then 'F' end) as Reintegro , CP.CPLIMP AS IMPORTE, 'P' as id_tipo_prestador, 'X' as Tipo_Debito, (CASE when CP.CPLIAD = 'S' then 'A' when CP.CPLIME = 'S' then 'M' when CP.CPLISI = 'S' then 'A' end) as id_origen_debito, (CASE when T.W47CCT = 'I' then '1' when T.W47CCT = 'D' then '-1' end) as signo_debito_credito, 'X' as id_origen_prestacion, T.W47PRO as id_producto, 'X' as id_plan_producto, 99999999 as id_persona, 19000101 as Fecha_Prestacion, 'X' as id_tipo_debito, CC.CUCNAF as afiliado, CC.CUCSAF as subnumero, CC.CUCSEC as secuencia, 0 as id_subproducto, CC.CUC_ITF as importe_facturado
from DESARROLLO.CUP004 CC join DESARROLLO.CUP102L CP on CC.CUC_NUM = CP.CPLNUM and CC.BCP_COD = CP.CPLCOD join SMPLIBD.T47FCON T on CP.CPLCON = T.W47CON WHERE CP.CPLAPL = 'S' and CC.CUC_FCI >= ? and CC.CUC_FCI <= ? and CC.ECA_COD not in ('A') and CC.CUC_BJA in (' ') and CC.CUCREI not in ('R') and CC.CUCCAP = ' ' and T.W47CCT in ('I')

properties.property:
Select CC.CUC_FRE as fecha_recepcion, CC.CUC_FCI as fecha_cierre, CO.CUC_NUM as nro_cursograma, CC.BCP_COD as Posicion_Barra, CP.CUARES as id_usuario_responsable, T.T47CON as Id_Concepto, T.T47CCT as Signo, CO.LOT_NUM as Nro_Lote, CO.CUP_SEC as Nro_Secuencia, CO.CUP_TOR as Tipo_Orden, CO.CUP_NOR as Nro_Orden, CO.CUP_TNO as Nomenclador, CO.CUP_CPR as Codigo_Prestacion, CO.CUP_ACR as Id_Acreedor, (CASE when CO.CUPREI = '' then 'F' end) as Reintegro , CP.CUA_DCI as Importe, 'P' as id_tipo_prestador, CP.CUATIP as Tipo_Debito, (CASE when CP.CUAIAD = 'S' then 'A' when CP.CUAIME = 'S' then 'M' when CP.CUAISI = 'S' then 'A' end) as id_origen_debito, (CASE when T.T47CCT = 'I' then '1' when T.T47CCT = 'D' then '-1' end) as signo_debito_credito , CO.ORI_COD as id_origen_prestacion, CO.CUP_SRV as id_producto, CO.CUP_PLA as id_plan_producto, CO.CLI_COD as id_persona, CO.CUP_FPE as Fecha_Prestacion, CO.CUPSPR as id_subproducto, CC.CUCNAF as afiliado, CC.CUCSAF as subnumero, CC.CUCSEC as secuencia, CC.CUC_ITF as importe_facturado from DESARROLLO.CUP004 CC join DESARROLLO.CUP102 CP on CC.CUC_NUM = CP.CUC_NUM and CC.BCP_COD = CP.BCP_COD join SMPLIBD.T47FCON T on CP.CUA_ERC = T.T47CON
join DESARROLLO.CUP008 CO on CC.CUC_NUM = CO.CUC_NUM and CC.BCP_COD = CO.BCP_COD and CP.LOT_NUM = CO.LOT_NUM and CP.CUC_NUM = CO.CUC_NUM and CP.CUP_SEC = CO.CUP_SEC
WHERE CP.CUAAPL = 'S' and CC.CUC_FCI >= ? and CC.CUC_FCI <= ? and CC.ECA_COD not in ('A') and CC.CUC_BJA in (' ') and T.T47CCT in ('I') and CC.CUCREI not in ('R') and CC.CUCCAP in (' ')
